snippet: The air war against the Islamic State provides a perfect real-life story line to a sequel, but much has changed since Tom Cruise starred as Maverick in the iconic 1986 blockbuster.
abstract: Aircraft carrier pilots, America's most important weapon against Islamic State, operate under circumstances much-changed since 1986 movie Top Gun popularized elite unit; carrier pilots operate 87 percent of country's manned airstrikes against militants but face more mundane tasks alongside new dangers.
lead_paragraph: The air war against the Islamic State provides a perfect real-life story line to a sequel, but much has changed since Tom Cruise starred as Maverick in the iconic 1986 blockbuster.

headline.main: For U.S. Pilots, the Real War on ISIS Is a Far Cry From ‘Top Gun’
headline.print_headline: For U.S. Carrier Pilots, the Real War Against ISIS Is a Far Cry From ‘Top Gun’

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
